item.title: Nobel Prize in Physics Is Awarded for Work in Quantum Mechanics
item.description: The prize was awarded to John Clarke, Michel H. Devoret and John M. Martinis.

item.title: Winning a Nobel Prize Interrupted His Off-the-Grid Vacation
item.description: Fred Ramsdell found out about his Nobel Prize nearly 12 hours after it was announced because he was on vacation in the Rockies.

item.title: How to Protect Your Pets From Pollution
item.description: Wildfire smoke, lead paint and other environmental toxins are health hazards for animals, too.

item.title: Israel Marks Two-Year Anniversary of Oct. 7 in Subdued Fashion
item.description: The second anniversary of the Oct. 7 attacks comes with peace talks underway, but with hostages still in Gaza, more than 67,000 Palestinians dead and ...

item.title: Supreme Court Hears Free Speech Challenge to Ban on Conversion Therapy
